actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-366.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution establishing a limitation on expenditures by the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service for the procurement of consultants.

summary.text: Authorizes $5,000 to be expended by the Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service for the procurement of the services of individual consultants, or organizations thereof, to carry out the provisions of S. Res. 52, 93rd Congress.

titles.title: A resolution establishing a limitation on expenditures by the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service for the procurement of consultants.
